title: Voxiom.io
description: A real-time multiplayer battle royale game with voxel graphics, combining elements of Minecraft and Fortnite. Build structures, gather resources, and battle against other players in a shrinking play area. Features different weapon types and building mechanics in a colorful voxel world.
how_to_play: Use WASD to move, Space to jump, and Shift to sprint. Left-click to shoot or break blocks, right-click to place blocks. Press 1-9 to switch between items in your hotbar. Collect resources, build defenses, and eliminate opponents to be the last player standing.
